tool.name: 性能防劣化
tool.creator: lujiale
tool.ui_config: [{"key":"case_need_dispatch","label":"是否分发 Case","formItem":{"extra":"选【是】，同一条case，只会被某一台设备执行一次；选【否】，则同一条case，会被所有设备各执行 N 次， N 为用例重复运行次数"},"rule":{"required":true,"message":"必须选择是否分发 Case"},"component":{"tag":"radio","options":[{"value":true,"label":"是"},{"value":false,"label":"否"}]},"children":[{"show":false,"key":"case_execute_times","label":"运行次数","value":1,"formItem":{"extra":"用例重复运行次数"},"rule":{"required":true,"message":"必须选择是否分发 Case"},"component":{"tag":"input","inputType":"number"}},{"show":false,"key":"case_local_retry_times","label":"失败重试次数","formItem":{"extra":"用例失败时，最多重试几次"},"rule":{"required":true,"message":"请填写重试次数"},"component":{"tag":"input","inputType":"number"}},{"show":true,"key":"case_remote_retry_times","label":"失败重试次数","formItem":{"extra":"用例失败时，最多重试几次"},"rule":{"required":true,"message":"请填写重试次数"},"component":{"tag":"input","inputType":"number"}}]},{"key":"need_repack","label":"是否重打包","formItem":{"extra":"使用 shoots-android 库时，非 root 手机需要重打包"},"rule":{"required":true},"component":{"tag":"radio","options":[{"value":true,"label":"是"},{"value":false,"label":"否"}]}},{"key":"path_blacklist","label":"接口黑名单(不参与录制)","formItem":{"extra":""},"rule":{"required":false},"component":{"tag":"select","multiple":true,"clearable":true,"create":true,"options":[]}},{"key":"replay_strict_mode","label":"时间按照录制返回的时间回放","formItem":{"extra":""},"rule":{"required":true},"component":{"tag":"radio","options":[{"value":true,"label":"是"},{"value":false,"label":"否"}]}},{"key":"replay_collection","label":"mock集合名称","value":"","formItem":{"extra":""},"rule":{"required":false},"component":{"tag":"input"}},{"key":"case_record_times","label":"重复录制次数","formItem":{"extra":""},"rule":{"required":true},"component":{"tag":"input","placeholder":"","inputType":"number"}},{"key":"record_case_gap_time","label":"录制阶段用例间隔时长","formItem":{"extra":""},"rule":{"required":true},"component":{"tag":"input","placeholder":"","inputType":"number"}},{"key":"replay_case_gap_time","label":"回放阶段用例间隔时长","formItem":{"extra":""},"rule":{"required":true},"component":{"tag":"input","placeholder":"","inputType":"number"}},{"key":"proxy_host_mapping","label":"按域名修改请求","formItem":{"extra":""},"rule":{"required":false},"component":{"tag":"select","multiple":true,"clearable":true,"create":true,"options":[]}}]

plugin.name: 通用性能数据采集插件

plugin.description: cpu/gpu/fps/pss等简单通用数据采集插件
plugin.ui_config: [{"component":{"options":[{"label":"是","value":true},{"label":"否","value":false}],"tag":"radio"},"formItem":{"extra":""},"key":"enable","label":"是否启用","rule":{"required":true}},{"key":"interval","label":"采集间隔","formItem":{"extra":"采集间隔需为100ms的整数倍"},"rule":{"required":false},"component":{"tag":"input","placeholder":"单位ms，默认 2000"}},{"key":"collect_type","label":"采集数据","formItem":{"extra":""},"rule":{"required":false},"component":{"tag":"checkbox","placeholder":"checkbox","options":[{"value":1,"label":"FPS"},{"value":2,"label":"CPU"},{"value":3,"label":"GPU"},{"value":4,"label":"Memory"},{"value":5,"label":"Disk"},{"value":6,"label":"Network"},{"value":7,"label":"Battery"},{"value":8,"label":"Fd"},{"value":9,"label":"Thread"},{"value":10,"label":"Temperature"}]}}]
